title: Lost link – FOUND!!!
content:
I’m looking for a site similar to 5inch.com that features blank media & cases in various solid colours. I’ve found several wholesale sites, but not the one I’m looking for. Does anyone have any idea what site I’m looking for?

 [‹ Trying to find Justin Menking](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121141827/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50426 "Go to previous forum topic") [InDesign: Sentence Case ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121141827/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50373 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ill sans

comments.content: Like **[Jewelboxing](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121141827/http:/www.jewelboxing.com/)**? Not exactly blank media cases in colors, but definitely nice, premium cases and all the necessary inside bits to make ’em look pretty.

If I remember correctly they did have jewel boxes as well as digipaks. I’m not sure if those (the jewel boxes) were coloured as well, but if not then they definitely had coloured inlays. Some of the colours I’m sure they had are yellow, orange, red, blue, lime green, black & white (probably also pink & purple). The digipaks also came in plain cardboard.  
I know I haven’t given much to go on, but that’s pretty much all I can remember about the site (which is also why I’m having so much troubles finding it).

Found it!!!  
Apparantly my mind played a few tricks on me seeing as they only do digipaks (for CD’s & DVD’s)... My bad!  
I can definitely recommand everyone to go take a look at [http://www.blankpak.com/english/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121141827/http:/www.blankpak.com/english/index.html "http://www.blankpak.com/english/index.html")  
You gotta love the colours!!!
You’re welcome! Hope you like it as much as I do ;-)
